events.description: John Egbert is introduced and given a name.
events.name: John's introduction

events.description: John moves the cake off of his magic chest and picks up the fake arms
events.name: EB quickly retrieves arms

events.description: John picks up the smoke pellets from his magic chest
events.name: John picks up smoke pellets

events.description: John picks up the poster in his room after examining the other items in it
events.name: John takes poster

events.description: John captchalogs a hammer from his room
events.name: John picks up a hammer

events.description: John picks up nails from his room, shooting the fake arms out due to captchalogue space
events.name: John picks up nails

events.description: John merges the hammer and nails to obtain the single HAMMER and NAILS object
events.name: John merges the hammer and nails

events.description: John uses the hammer and nails with the poster to nail it to his wall
events.name: John nails poster to wall

events.description: John looks over his room and sees the posters, the calendar, and the cake, which he refuses to eat because he has had too much
events.name: John examines his room

events.description: Dave messages John and asks what he got during for his birthday. John and Dave discuss the little monsters poster and then Dave tells john to check the mail for his beta. Dave mentions he has two copies
events.name: TG -> EB: dave asks john to check mail for beta

events.description: John notices through his window that the mail has been delivered. In the mail is the beta, which john's father picks up
events.name: Beta is in mailbox

events.description: Dave attempts to message john but john does not answer
events.name: TG -> EB: ping

events.description: After examining his CD shelf and colonel sassacre's text, John has a lapse of judgement and captchalogues the arms again
events.name: John picks up fake arms again

events.description: john gets back to dave on the status of his beta, and lets him know that his dad took it. they discuss the sylladex and fetch modi. Dave recommends allocating the hammer to John's strife specibus
events.name: EB -> TG: Fetch Modus convo

events.description: To free up space in the sylladex, john puts the fake arms in the cake
events.name: John puts fake arms in cake

events.description: On Dave's advice, John sets his strife specibus to hammerkind and then allocates his hammer to it.
events.name: John assigns hammer to strife specifibus

events.description: John reports back to dave that he allocated his specibus to hammerkind. Dave notes that this is permament, and perhaps he should have mentioned that before
events.name: EB -> TG: specibus allocations are permanent

events.description: John picks up the colonol sassacre book
events.name: John captchalogues sassacre

events.description: John picks up gameBro and a magicians hat, then combiness the hat with the beaglepuss to make a clever disguise which he immediately puts on
events.name: John picks up more gear

events.description: After getting equipped to disguise dad, John steps into the hallway
events.name: john leaves room

events.description: John goes into the living room and tosses the game bro magazine into the fire
events.name: john tosses gamebro into fire

events.description: John picks up and interacts with living room objects and upgrades to beefed up clever disguise
events.name: john explores the living room

events.description: John cleans up and replaces the spilled urn
events.name: John fixes the urn

events.description: John rushes back to his room and grabs the fake arms andd also receives a ping on pesterchum
events.name: john gets ping and grabs arms

events.description: Rose messages john and asks if he has the game yet, then advises that he get it from his father
events.name: TT -> EB: Go get the game

events.description: John cleans up various articles from around the room
events.name: John cleans up the living room

events.description: John explores the study while searching for his dad
events.name: John looks for dad in study

events.description: John plays the piano refrain
events.name: [S] John: Play haunting piano refrain
